imdb.plot outline: With someone having broken into the office of Adult Sex-Ed Evangelist & Mojo Motivator Ginger Peechee-Keane, stealing her session tapes and threatening to release them online, Dr. Ginger has opted to beat them to the punch and -- with her clients' consent -- she has released the tapes herself in the hopes that they may be of service to others in relationship distress. The lunchtime sessions -- held in the storage/meeting room at the Multnomah County Community Center -- were offered on a sliding scale to fulfill Dr. Ginger's community service requirement for nude sunbathing at Multnomah Falls National Park.
imdb.title: Talk to Me, Ginger!
plot: Improvisational comedy web series that skewers relationship counseling. Based on Mariann Aalda's performance art character "Adult Sex-Ed Evangelist and Mojo Motivator Ginger Peechee-Keane" and her own experiences with marriage counseling.

With someone having broken into the office of Adult Sex-Ed Evangelist & Mojo Motivator Ginger Peechee-Keane, stealing her session tapes and threatening to release them online, Dr. Ginger has opted to beat them to the punch and -- with her clients' consent -- she has released the tapes herself in the hopes that they may be of service to others in relationship distress. The lunchtime sessions -- held in the storage/meeting room at the Multnomah County Community Center -- were offered on a sliding scale to fulfill Dr. Ginger's community service requirement for nude sunbathing at Multnomah Falls National Park.::mariannaalda
